DOC.brief_title: Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT ) Normative Data Collection Study ( S-2013-2 )
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , prospective , observational ( non-interventional ) study second series measure structural parameter optic nerve head , peripapillary retinal nerve fiber layer , macula use Heidelberg Spectralis OCT device . This study conduct normal Japanese volunteer . The main goal study provide range structural parameter normal eye . The study include least 224 ( enrollment target : 249 ) normal volunteer ; study site recruit 32 40 subject age range 18 90 year approximately equal number female male . All subject undergo Spectralis OCT imaging , biometric ophthalmoscopic examination , disc photography visual field test one single visit . All examination perform subject non-significant risk procedure medical device clear market Europe U.S .
DOC.criteria: Subject employee eye clinic . Age ≥18 90 . Able willing undergo test procedure , give consent , follow instruction . Healthy eye without prior intraocular surgery ( except cataract surgery ) without clinically significant vitreal , retinal choroidal disease , clinically significant diabetic retinopathy ( subject may diabetes ) , disease optic nerve . Small Drusen acceptable old subject . Japanese decent ( selfreported ) . Negative history glaucoma . Intraocular pressure ≤21mmHg . Best correct visual acuity ≥0.5 . Refraction +6 6 diopter astigmatism ≤ 2 diopter . Axial length ≤ 26.0 mm Normal visual field Glaucoma Hemifield Test Mean Deviation within normal limit , abnormal visual field judgment ophthalmologist . Clinically normal appearance optic disc , normal appear neuroretinal rim respect color shape . The optic disc examine ophthalmoscopically evaluation stereo photograph . When eye eligible , eye enter study . Unreliable visual field . The reliability index use guide well perimetrist 's note . Unusable disc stereo photo . Inability undergo test . Insufficient quality Spectralis OCT image ( determine Spectralis OCT examination , unusual circumstance ) . Minimum requirement : Retina completely include image frame , Quality Score ≥ 20 stored ART mean image , For ONHR scan : Center position error ≤ 100 μm . Note : Inability subject perform one two scan pattern insufficient image quality one scan pattern exclude subject eye study .
